headline: This Struggling Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock Could Be About to Take Off. Here's Why.
summary: The last several months have been rough for investors in Super Micro Computer, but better days could be on the horizon.

headline: Super Micro Stock Is Slipping. An SMCI Recovery Has This Hurdle.
summary: Super Micro Computer  stock was falling Wednesday, though it looks like the shares are stabilizing after falling sharply.  Its former auditor, Ernst & Young, resigned in October after raising concerns that Super Micro’s controls around financial reporting might be flawed.  The company is also looking for a new chief financial officer and chief accounting officer.

headline: Super Micro Computer Dropped 70% from Its High and Is Exiting the Nasdaq 100. Could This Beaten-Down Stock Recover in 2025?
summary: The year 2024 represented the best and worst of times for Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ: SMCI).  In fact, Supermicro's quarterly revenue this year surpassed annual revenue as recently as 2021.  The company also went on to reach other important milestones, such as winning invitations to join the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq 100.

headline: Super Micro Computer: Be Greedy When Others Are Fearful
summary: Super Micro Computer's strong fundamentals, attractive valuation, and improving technical setup offer a compelling investment opportunity. See why SMCI stock is a Buy.
